O foro in ka kan ka kɛ jɔyɔrɔ ɲuman ye.
The :attribute must be at least :length: O foro in ka kan ka kɛ taamasiyɛn :length ye a dɔgɔyalenba la ani nimɔrɔ kelen ka kan ka kɛ a kɔnɔ.

The given :attribute has appeared in a d: Foro dilen in bɔra kunnafoni-falen-falen dɔ la. Aw ye foro wɛrɛ sugandi.
